morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (the same as Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action is desired or expected
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person being spoken or written to
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that hopefully happens - by a person being spoken or written to
